item.title: Christian add a quote by Paolo Bacigalupi
item.description: "is not fighting that he fears; it is not death; it is the waiting and uncertainty, and it breaks Jaideeâ€™s heart that Niwat knows nothing of the waiting terrors, and that the waiting terrors are all around them now. So many things can only be fought by waiting." -- Paolo Bacigalupi

item.title: Christian add a quote by Iain Banks
item.description: "People can be teachers and idiots; they can be philosophers and idiots; they can be politicians and idiots ... in fact I think they have to be ... a genius can be an idiot. The world is largely run for and by idiots; it is no great handicap in life and in certain areas is actually a distinct advantage and even a prerequisite for advancement." -- Iain Banks

item.title: Christian add a quote by Glenn Greenwald
item.description: "Taken in its entirety, the Snowden archive led to an ultimately simple conclusion: the US government had built a system that has as its goal the complete elimination of electronic privacy worldwide. Far from hyperbole, that is the literal, explicitly stated aim of the surveillance state: to collect, store, monitor, and analyze all electronic communication by all people around the globe. The agency is devoted to one overarching mission: to prevent the slightest piece of electronic communication from evading its systemic grasp." -- Glenn Greenwald
